fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.junit.sms.config

Class RandomPortConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.junit.sms.config.RandomPortConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortConfig

    public class RandomPortConfig
extends Object
implements PortConfig
    Configuration that builds a RandomServerPortProvider with the provided range of ports. RandomServerPortProvider will in turn provide a random port that is in the provided range.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
